mapper.insert: insert into pathological( unique_id, unique_id_lv1, unique_id_lv2, p900, patient_id, visit_id, pathology_no, inspect_time, reprot_time, origin, histological_types, degree, primary_degree, relationship, invade_bile, invade_liver, invade_nodule, invade_lymphatic, invade_vascular, invade_nerve, cut_edge, edge_distance, lymph_node_total, if_transfer, transfer_number, transfer_site, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{uniqueId}, #{uniqueIdLv1}, #{uniqueIdLv2}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{pathologyNo}, #{inspectTime}, #{reprotTime}, #{origin}, #{histologicalTypes}, #{degree}, #{primaryDegree}, #{relationship}, #{invadeBile}, #{invadeLiver}, #{invadeNodule}, #{invadeLymphatic}, #{invadeVascular}, #{invadeNerve}, #{cutEdge}, #{edgeDistance}, #{lymphNodeTotal}, #{ifTransfer}, #{transferNumber}, #{transferSite}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update pathological set unique_id = #{uniqueId}, unique_id_lv1 = #{uniqueIdLv1}, unique_id_lv2 = #{uniqueIdLv2}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, pathology_no = #{pathologyNo}, inspect_time = #{inspectTime}, reprot_time = #{reprotTime}, origin = #{origin}, histological_types = #{histologicalTypes}, degree = #{degree}, primary_degree = #{primaryDegree}, relationship = #{relationship}, invade_bile = #{invadeBile}, invade_liver = #{invadeLiver}, invade_nodule = #{invadeNodule}, invade_lymphatic = #{invadeLymphatic}, invade_vascular = #{invadeVascular}, invade_nerve = #{invadeNerve}, cut_edge = #{cutEdge}, edge_distance = #{edgeDistance}, lymph_node_total = #{lymphNodeTotal}, if_transfer = #{ifTransfer}, transfer_number = #{transferNumber}, transfer_site = #{transferSite}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
